channel.title: linux on Nikhil Bhat
channel.description: Recent content in linux on Nikhil Bhat

item.title: Old Game on bhagat singh
item.description: Recently came across this article Took me back to good old college days when my friend had demoed this game to me. The novelty factor about this game being Hindi dialogue. I wanted to relive the experience and luckily, i found the game on an abandonware site. Here I have jotted down the steps to actually play this game on Linux which is my OS of choice wget https://dl.myabandonware.com/t/37eh49RPy2DEroOS85U1CIF6w3b611vERgHURK0A3p5dl53Yc6/Bhagat-Singh-The-Game_Win_EN_ISO-Version.zip sudo apt install -y bchunk wine64 unzip -d bhagat Bhagat-Singh-The-Game_Win_EN_ISO-Version.
